title: how can I use an mp3 as the ringtone on the pixel3?
content: Hi, I'm trying to use an mps as my ringtone. I see that in Sound | Phone ringtone there is an option for  "My Sounds" but there is no menu option to add mp3s to the group "My Sounds". Anybody know how to add one's own choice of music to the My Sounds group? thanks
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
